                                   SocomException

        Parameters:
        game -
        version -
        password -
        contextid -
        Returns:
        List of Contexts containing the ids of their neighbour-nodes

        org.json.JSONException

      • setGameInstanceImage

        public int setGameInstanceImage(SocomRequest req)
                         throws SocomException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                org.json.JSONException,
                                java.sql.SQLException
        POST-METHOD Set the image for the given gameinstance which will represent the game in the web-application Params must be given as cookies
        Parameters:
        game -
        password -
        gameversion - (since version is reserved in cookies)
        extension - Filename extension of the uploaded image file
        The - Post-Stream should include the image (Good-Sizes: 460px × 150px ~ 380px × 260px)
        Returns:
        success boolean
        Throws:
        SocomException
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.JSONException
        java.sql.SQLException

      • setGameContextImage

        public int setGameContextImage(SocomRequest req)
                        throws SocomException,
                               java.io.IOException,
                               java.sql.SQLException,
                               org.json.JSONException
        POST-METHOD Set the image for the given gamecontext in the given gameinstance which will represent the context in the web-application Params must be given as cookies
        Parameters:
        game -
        password -
        gameversion - (since version is reserved in cookies)
        contextid -
        extension - Filename extension of the uploaded image file
        The - Post-Stream should include the image (Good-Sizes: 460px × 150px ~ 380px × 260px)
        Returns:
        success boolean
        Throws:
        SocomException
        java.io.IOException
        org.json.JSONException
        java.sql.SQLException
